5015.name: Custom Pretendo Error
5015.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please try again later. If the problem persists, please make a note of the error code and visit support.nintendo.com.
5015.long_description: No Service Token was provided. Usually indicates your PNID is not linked to your console.
5015.short_solution: Make sure your PNID is actually linked to your user account.
5015.long_solution: Make sure your PNID is linked to your console. If it's not linked yet, make a new user on your console, add the account and try again. If this error code persists, join the [Pretendo Discord](https://invite.gg/pretendo) for help.
